channel.title: food on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in food on Barefoot Rob

item.title: IKEA buffet
item.description: 18:21 Sunday 23 December 2018 JST Lin and I joined her sister and sister’s daughter for a circuit of IKEA and then buffet. I put rechargable batteries into the cart but tried to slow down the rate of other items coming into the cart. Lin wants to buy a new light but did not measure the existing space to know how low a new light could hang.

item.title: ate after 10pm last night
fun time at Gekko
item.description: 18:09 Saturday 21 October 2017 JST Good time at Gekko, though a bit expensive overall. 4500 yen for 3 hours of all we can eat; 2 hours for 2⁄3 the price would have been better for me.. BUT we got to have grilled bananas with cinamon, so yeah that was pretty good. Talked to Sebastian, Tim, Mi-chan, Sayori. Sayori got progressively intoxicated and entertaining, though it may have worn out after much longer.

item.title: Supper with Yuuji
item.description: ##18:39 Wednesday 03 December 2014 JST## We’re going to eat in Kawasaki at my favorite Chinese restaurant. ##20:28pm yay! My favorite waitress was there! She’s the one who, on my birthday when I asked 誕生日チュは？ exclaimed “ヤダ！”

item.title: Today
item.description: (transcribed 4:35pm CST Wednesday 22 January 2003) 3:50P.M. I’m going to quit writing down what I eat. It takes up to much room and doesn’t do much good. 1st Period - I wrote an outline for my research paper and I turned in a thesis statement. Miss Carter wrote it (thesis) though. 2nd we graded tests. Donald Martin graded mine. I got a 47 on it but he wrote it so it looked like a 97.

item.title: Today
item.description: (transcribed 4:18pm CST Wednesday 22 January 2003) 3:50P.M. I had 2 bowls of Crispix for breakfast. For lunch, I had a roll, tea, and pizza and veggie sticks. For a snack I had a piece of cake, milk, slice of meat, and graham crackers. 1st pd. Library. I worked on my paper more. 2nd I failed a test. I have about a 50 in there. 3rd. We found out what is on our test tomorrow.
